source.title: Continental AG (2024) Ergonomics Requirement Specification — Anthropometric Data (P5/P50/P95)
source.note: Country-level P5/P50/P95 for stature and biacromial breadth used to derive ratio percentiles.

assumptions.distribution: Normal approximation per variable via (p5,p50,p95) → (mu, sigma)
assumptions.method: Monte Carlo via correlated normals; ratio = biacromial / height

shoulderHeightRatio.notes: Derived by simulating correlated stature and biacromial breadth using country-specific P5/P50/P95. Correlation reflects positive covariation of height and shoulder breadth. The ratio percentiles (p10,p25,p50,p75,p90) are intended for labeling only; use 'diagnostic' if auditing.
